summary:
Description:
Steve is my first mod,
With all the simple companion features. (wait, command, follow, fire)
He can be hired at the Sleeping Giants inn Located in riverwood,
he will also go there when fired.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Steve is my first mod,He has a good glass dagger, and can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn located in riverwood.He has a fully functional inventory that you can access.and he has all the other functions of a normal follower (wait, command, send back home)When you fire him he returns to the Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood)

The more i learn, the more i will add. I will try to update Everyday, if possible.
Any Suggestions, tips, or Advise. i will most likely use

Updates:

V1.0:
Ready to use!
Steve no longer attacks everyone before you hire him.
All Common Glitches (Not really, just stupid stuff i never noticed until now) Have been fixed.


V0.7:
Steve will now attack anyone you attack, and will now do more crimes.

V0.6:
Steve No longer has Overpowered dagger. (Might still appear when you first see him, but does not actually use it and will switch weapons the first time he enters combat.)



Permissions:
Can be openly used for any purpose.
GREAT template for making your own followers (will make a template as a separate file once i start adding quests to Steve.)

Credits:
Completely Credited to me
Master408646
author: Cybo327
